descriptionHtml:
[size=3.9][font=arial][color=red]Notice that no longer will do more mods because of my work and other circumstances, if anyone wants to continue with this mod, you can do freely, just ask I mention in the credits, thanks[/color][/size][/font]


[size=3.7][font=arial][color=aqua]This is fast long-range weapon and was made thinking in those long trips of descovering and is ideal for use it on horseback[/color][/size][/font]

[b][size=5][color=red]WhatÂ´s new?[/color][/size][/b]
[size=3][font=arial]
I finally fix the blood texture problem, redid the whole model and add a texture much more detailed (4096X4096 px), this texture is optional

I really want to thank all those people who downloaded my weapon and gave me an endorsement or a nice comment, really thanks you, you motivated me to continue with this little project beyond rescue


[color=yellow]Tested in 1.7 patch dawnguard game an work perfect [/font][/size][/color]


[color=limegreen]My other mods[/color]

[size=3.5][color=red]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/22442/[/color][/size]

[size=3.5][color=red]http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/20069/[/color][/size]
author: Micheero
